RDF(S) Access APIs, May 2008
20
© García-Castro, Corcho, Muñoz-García
Hands-on
• To read an ontology in RDF(S) from two files:
– GP_Santiago.rdf (conceptualization)
– GP_Santiago.rdfs (instances)
• To write the class hierarchy of the ontology, including the 
instances of each class:
